core_meaning: Sextile between Venus and Neptune opens opportunity/skill. Venus: affection, art, harmony, pleasure, values. Neptune: . General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

facets.career: Design, branding, client harmony, tasteful presentation.  Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.money: Luxury/beauty revenues, pricing power via desirability.  Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.health_adj: Glucose balance, skin, reproductive health; moderation.  Emphasis: opportunity/skill.

risk_notes: Complacency or overextension; assuming goodwill covers weak execution.
People-pleasing → scope creep; set clear give-and-get.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Venus: design, harmonize, price; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Venus: design, harmonize, price; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Venus: design, harmonize, price; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Venus: design, harmonize, price; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Venus: design, harmonize, price; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Venus: design, harmonize, price; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

hi.title: Venus Sextile Neptune (हिन्दी)
hi.core: Venus और Neptune का Sextile — ऊर्जा opportunity/skill के रूप में चलती है. थोड़ा संतुलन रखें; अवसर और सीख दोनों मिलेंगे.
